title: Interpretation of shaving hair in a dream for single and married women

preview.html: Interpretation of shaving hair in a dream for single and married women: Shaving hair indicates that the dreamer will give up important things in his life in the coming period and that there are some tiring events that will happen to him in the near future, but these tiring events can end in a positive way in the end and can be achieved. These dreams are basic and remain just dreams that have ended after waking up. A dream for a single and married woman. What is the interpretation of shaving hair in a dream? We present in the following paragraph what the scholar Muhammad bin Sirin narrated about this vision: Although it is believed that this dream indicates sadness, it nevertheless indicates that worries and troubles will stop and the situation will change for the better. It was before. *Shaving the hair of the head to perform the Hajj rituals indicates that one will fulfill one’s debts and obtain goodness. The dreamer sees himself shaving his head, this indicates that he will be promoted in a job or that he will obtain a source of livelihood from which he will reap a lawful profit that God has blessed him with. Shaving a woman’s head is a bad omen of serious disputes between them. And between her husband, there may not be serious consequences, and God knows best. This dream indicates the annulment of the contract, the relief of distress, and the end of troubles. While any person who has a high position in his job or is wealthy has a lot of money and possessions, unlike the above, this dream It means goodness and food, but in this case it shows poverty, loss and destruction. Money, kingship, and position, God forbid. Interpretation of a dream about shaving hair for a single woman. In the following points, we provide you with evidence for seeing a single woman shaving her hair in a dream: This dream indicates that he may be exposed to some health problems or that he will suffer from some disease, but he will recover quickly, thanks to God. Sometimes it symbolizes the loss of a person dear to her heart, and God knows best. It could also be an indication that he has great ambitions and many dreams, but is unable to achieve them. Interpretation of a dream about shaving hair for a married woman. The following is the interpretation of a dream about a married woman shaving her hair in a dream: Seeing a married woman shaving Her hair symbolizes her reaching menopause and the end of the ability to reproduce, instead of seeing long hair, which indicates childbearing and imminent pregnancy. The fact that a married woman shaves her hair indicates how close she is to God Almighty, her piety, and her willingness to perform her duties and acts of obedience in their season. Seeing shaving body hair , not the head, is a sign of the blessed livelihood for him and the goodness that he will receive in his next life. The husband shaving his wife’s hair symbolizes serious disagreements between them and permanent quarrels. Interpretation of a dream about a man shaving his hair. The interpretation of shaving hair in a dream depends on the man himself, and whether he shaved the hair he loves. Or if he prefers long hair and does not like shaving it, which we will explain below: Shaving the head is evidence of wisdom and rationality, his position among men, and his success in resolving disputes entrusted to him among men. Shaving his hair to go to Hajj is a good omen for paying off the debt and turning the matter into happiness and goodness. Stopping shaving the mustache indicates stress and distress and to hear the good news of God’s command. If in reality shaving one’s hair is unpleasant, then this dream portends an illness.

title: Learn about the interpretation of dreams about dough and bread from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing dough and bread in a dream. Seeing bread and dough is considered one of the good visions that carry many positive connotations. This vision has many interpretations that differ based on many considerations, including that the bread can be moldy, dry, or fresh, and the person himself can see it. The person who buys or sells bread and dough, and what does it mean for us in this article, we will look at all the cases and special significance of seeing dough and bread. Learn about the interpretation of dreams about dough and bread from Ibn Sirin Interpretation of a dream about dough and bread Seeing bread and dough represents bliss, good life, growth and prosperity, and circumstances change from distress to spaciousness and from sadness to pleasure. This vision also indicates the color blue, abundant goodness, the blessing of money and food, success in all other businesses, facilitation and removal of complications. If one sees dough and bread, it is a sign of sound nature, religion, good faith, Islam, true religion, abundant knowledge, blessings and countless gifts. On the other hand, seeing bread indicates the basic requirements in life, basic needs, living income, hard work and profit to manage future affairs. Seeing dough and bread is evidence of a unique personality who loves to do good and has high values, high morals, a good biography and a reputation that precedes its owner in councils. If the bread is white in color, it symbolizes happiness, blessing, legitimate sustenance, satisfaction, fertility, and natural instinct. And walking on the right path without distortion or neglect. Interpretation of dreams, dough and bread by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin sees in his interpretation of seeing dough and bread that this vision expresses simplicity, reputation, a position of prestige, good behavior, reputation, and giving what is in the soul for the sake of others. Seeing bread expresses the food of the soul, asceticism and piety, warding off suspicions and temptations, what he sees of them and what he hides, the pillars of religion and the straight path, and the tendency from the world and vitality. Return to God. This vision also indicates the company of the righteous and scholars, benefiting from them, gaining knowledge and science, understanding of Sharia, and good conditions. Ibn Sirin mentions that ripe bread is better for the king than unripe bread, white bread is better than black, and pure bread is better than the other. If a person sees that he is kneading bread, this indicates that he will undertake an important job that will take up his time and comfort, change his life and change it a lot, and finally get what he wants from pleasure. If a person sees warm bread, this expresses bliss, comfort and reassurance, achieving many goals, reaping the fruits of patience and work, dedication to work and skill. Whoever sees that he is kneading and eating bread, this indicates longevity and enjoyment of health and well-being, and that he has many skills and abilities that help him achieve his goal in the shortest possible time. Interpretation of dreams, dough and bread for a single woman Seeing dough and bread in a dream symbolizes good health, and

title: Interpretation: God is sufficient. There is no god but Him. Trust in Him and He is the Lord of the Great Throne in a dream

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of God is sufficient, there is no god but Him, I trust in Him, and He is the Lord of the Mighty Throne in a dream. Man has been searching since ancient times for signs and interpretations related to his dreams and what they indicate in his real life, despite the fact that dreams are a set of unrealistic and irrelevant situations that a person sees at night while sleeping, but it is fixed in all human cultures, including Islamic culture, that dreams carry in their hearts. Events Many symbols and signs that tell a person what the future holds for him. In Islamic culture, many scholars have excelled in the field of dream interpretation, such as Ibn Khaldun, Al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Sirin, author of the book The Great Interpretation of Dreams, which we will present to you today with his interpretation, saying: “God is sufficient, there is no god but Him, I trust in Him, and He is the Lord of the Mighty Throne in a dream.” Encyclopedia. Interpretation: Allah is sufficient for me, there is no god but He, I trust in Him, and He is the Lord of the Mighty Throne in a dream. By saying: Allah is sufficient for me, there is no god but He, I trust in Him, and He is the Lord of the Mighty Throne in a dream. It is known that the saying (Allah is sufficient for me, there is no god but He, I trust in Him, and He is the Lord of the Mighty Throne) has been mentioned in the Noble Prophetic Sunnah about the best of creation. The chosen one, the best prayer and most complete submission, is said to show the servant’s helplessness before the Lord, his need and trust in Him in all matters of his life. It is also said in the formula (Allah is sufficient and the best trust) to prove that Allah alone is able to support the oppressed, restore his right, and prevent the oppressors and corrupt on earth. Ibn Sirin explained that when a person sees in a dream that he says: “Allah is sufficient for me, there is no god but He, I trust in Him, and He is the Lord of the Mighty Throne.” If a person is wronged in this world by a specific person and sees in his dream that he intended this person with this request, this indicates that this oppressed person will be afflicted by Allah with an illness or a major problem in his life. As a result of people’s injustice and slander. Interpretation of a dream of trusting in God for singles Ibn Sirin showed that when an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she says (Allah is sufficient for me, there is no god but Him, I trust in Him and He is the Lord of the Mighty Throne), this portends the imminent achievement of something that she has been hoping for and praying to God for a long time. However, if she is unmarried and says this prayer in her dream and it is accompanied by wailing and crying, this indicates that there are many problems in her life and that she is suffering from many difficulties. When an unmarried woman sees this request in her prayer in her dream, this means that God will soon grant her comfort that satisfies her heart and fulfills her desires. However, if an unmarried woman sees that she is praying for a specific person with this request, this is evidence that God will grant her victory over this person and restore her right. Interpretation: Allah is sufficient for me, there is no god but Him, I trust in Him and He is the Lord of the Mighty Throne for a married woman Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision of a married woman by saying: “Allah is sufficient for me, there is no god but Him, I trust in Him and He is the Lord of the Mighty Throne in a dream.” It indicates God’s victory over her unjust enemies who caused her evil and sadness in her life. Seeing this supplication also shows that the married woman will be freed from the injustice that will happen to her soon.

title: Interpretation of soft drinks in a dream, dream of cola and soda

preview.html: Interpretation of drinking Pepsi in a dreamDrinking Cola in a dream 7 in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of drinking Cola by Ibn SirinInterpretation of a dream of eating MerindaInterpretation of a dream of drinking Pepsi by Ibn SirinDrinking ships in a dreamDrinking in a dreamInterpretation of the appearance of soft drinks in a dreamA soft drink or soft drink, a modern product that coincides with the late nineteenth century and the beginning of the twentieth century. The Coca-Cola company began as a product sold in pharmacies and then slowly turned into a huge industry that conquered all global markets. It is known, brothers, that promoting these drinks required a huge amount of marketing propaganda, as their appearance dominated major sporting events. As well as art and more, so that every person knows Or the person of these products, even if they live in the bush! Advertising and advertising are not limited to our conscious minds, but have widely seeped into the subconscious. No wonder, gentlemen, that we see these products in our dreams, because they simply continue the flashes of advertisements that we see in waking life, since we have been stingy enough not to pay attention to them, but in reality they are an integral part of the subconscious, and from there it determines consumer behavior And our general mood. Those conducting advertising campaigns and sellers did not ignore infiltrating our dreams to convince us of this or that product. This was one of the reasons for the appearance of soft drinks in a dream, but there are many other reasons that we will discover successively in this presentation. Freshness and thirst or thirst Coca-Cola, Pepsi-Cola or Fanta and ships became associated with the idea of ​​refreshment and the associated feeling of happiness, even if only for a short time, because The refreshing effect it leaves on the drinker immediately after drinking it. It is characterized by quenching thirst or other thirsts {happiness, success, passion, ...} Feeling thirsty in a dream despite the presence of water or juice indicates your urgent need for change. As for drinking soft drinks in a dream greedily or often, this indicates your unlimited and undirected desires, and perhaps this indicates that you are indulging in fun and missing out on opportunities one after another. Drinking soft drinks in moderation or in a reasonable quantity symbolizes the psychological balance of the viewer, as he is a person who does not neglect He fulfills his duties, and does not withdraw from himself, but rather seeks entertainment and change from time to time. If you see in your dream that you broke a bottle, bottle, or cup that had a soft drink in it and you see that the drink has spilled or spilled on your clothes or on your home furniture, then this is an interpretation of new expenses for them. The interpretation of soft drinks varies according to their color and taste, of course, the more beautiful the color. And it tastes great, the better the interpretation of drinking it, is often associated with instant happiness or some sudden change, but does not carry. Its interpretation is permanent and continuous, good for health, money, and other things. Soft drinks or cola in a single woman’s dream. A large percentage of girls like to drink cola or soft drinks. As for an unmarried girl who sees in her dream that she is eating a moderate amount of it, this is a good interpretation, because this drink is sweet.

title: Interpretation of a dream about hitting my grandmother in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about hitting my grandmother in a dream. Some people want to know the interpretation of the dream about hitting my grandmother in a dream. Among the dreams that many wanted to know is the interpretation of this dream. They are diligent scholars who seek to interpret dreams. Interpretation of a dream about beating my grandmother in a dream: Beating my grandmother in a dream may indicate the large sum that the dreamer obtains during this period. It is possible that seeing the grandmother beating in a dream indicates the blessings and good things that the dreamer receives during this time, by God. I know. Seeing a grandmother being beaten in a dream may indicate happy events that will come to the dreamer in his life during this period. Everyone who sees in his dream that he was beating his grandmother, could indicate the abundance of money that the dreamer gets at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation Dreaming of beating a cat to death in a dream Beating a cat to death in a dream may mean an end to the worries and sadness that the dreamer was facing in his life at that time. In the case of my personal opinion that he was beating the cat to death, this may indicate a rejection of a crisis and problem that the dreamer was facing in That time. Killing the cat due to repeated beatings may indicate the end of the injustice that was on the dreamer’s shoulders in those days, and God knows best. In the case of his personal view of beating the cat to death, this may indicate that he stopped the sin that he was doing at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about hitting Satan in the form of a human being in a dream. Striking Satan who was present in human form could indicate the end of the crisis that the dreamer suffered during his life at that time. Whoever dreams that he is hitting Satan, it could indicate the end of envy or evil eye. It occurred to him in those days. Beating Satan in a human form in a dream may indicate getting rid of the presence of evil people in the life of the dreamer during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about hitting my maid in a dream: The maid hitting the dreamer in a dream may indicate good things that will come to the dreamer. During this time. If one sees the maid hitting him, this may indicate that circumstances have changed for the better, thanks to God. In the event that one sees the maid hitting him, this may indicate wrong decisions made by the dreamer and he must stop them immediately. Interpretation of a dream about hitting a pig In a dream: Whoever sees in a dream that he is hitting a pig, it may indicate that he will get rid of the hostility that was present in his life in the previous period. Beating a pig in a dream could indicate getting close to the Blessed and Almighty God, and stopping the sins and disobedience that the dreamer was committing at that time. Dreaming of a pig in a dream may indicate the end of the financial crisis that the dreamer faced in his life during this period. Whoever sees in his dream that he was beating a pig may indicate happy events that come to the dreamer after suffering, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of beating a thief in a dream. Anyone who dreams of beating a thief It could indicate the strength and courage of the dreamer at that time. Beating a thief in a dream indicates the fulfillment of desires and goals thanks to God. title: Interpretation of a dream about becoming a dentist

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream that I became a dentist in a dreamInterpretation of a dream that I became a dentist in a dreamInterpretation of a dream that I became a dentist in a dream could be a sign of things that are not good, and God is Most High and Most Knowing, as He can express the responsibilities that bother him, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees that he has become a doctor Teeth in a dream may be evidence of negative changes, and God knows the unseen. When you visit the dentist, it may indicate the need to get rid of crises and problems, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream that I became a lawyer in a dream. title: Interpretation of a dream about hitting one’s sister

preview.html: The world of dream interpretation tells you that being beaten in a dream is good news, especially for the one who is being beaten. The following lines explain the details via gptafser.com/. Interpretation of seeing a dream about hitting a sister in a dream about a single girl. Seeing a sister slapped in the face in a dream indicates an unmarried girl. To get married with her in the same workplace. If she does not work, this is a sign that she is getting married. From someone who knows her well and proposes to her. If an unmarried girl sees that she is hitting her sister with a stick or in a dream. It is a sign of a lack of understanding and agreement between the two brothers, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Perhaps the vision shows that she does not listen to the opinions that she presents to her sister in reality. But if An unmarried girl saw that she was hitting her sister hard, until she hit her in a dream. It is a sign of a strong friendship that will bind the two sisters for life. Seeing a father hitting his daughter in an unmarried girl’s dream may symbolize the intense love that a father can give to his daughter, and that Through the advice he gives her. On the day of the dream, the sister hit the shoe in a dream for a single girl. To get rid of inappropriate methods were carried out from the ground. Either if the unmarried girl sees her sister hitting her, then she pleases her in the dream. It is a message that he advises her is not in her favor then She pulls it. See also: Interpretation of seeing a sister in a dream and its meaning according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a dream of hitting a sister in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman sees her sister hitting her in a dream, and there were many problems between the two sisters in waking life. The vision showed the collapse of the problems and the solution of affection and understanding between the two brothers. If a married woman sees her sister hitting her with a stick in a dream. The vision shows the benefit that will accrue to the assaulted sister. On the other hand, if a married woman sees her sister hitting her severely in a dream. Evidence of advice to place blame on the attacker, to guide the dreamer on the right path. Or when you see a husband beating his wife, and that the beating was harsh and you are in pain because of it in the dream. It is an indication that her husband blames her for many matters related to life, and God Almighty knows best. It can be said that the dream is about the severe beating that a married woman is subjected to by her husband. But the husband A shrewd man directs harsh words to his wife, and God knows best. It refers to a dream of a husband hitting his wife in the stomach in a dream. During the period of pregnancy that the couple had been waiting for for a long time. Interpretation of seeing a dream of hitting a sister in a dream about a man and its meaning. If a married man sees his older brother hitting him in a dream. They prove that he obtains great benefit from the aggressor over the assaulted. He knocks on wood in a married man’s dream. He seems to be making promises, but he does not keep them, and God knows best. Whereas if a married man sees that he is hitting someone on the head in a dream. And this It means that he bases his opponent on something, perhaps money, work, work, or something of the like, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. We may see that seeing a husband beating his wife in a dream. It is an indication of the many benefits that the wife will obtain through her husband. Dreaming of a husband hitting a manager in Work yen

title: Interpretation of seeing an eyebrow in a dream in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing eyebrows by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin, who interprets seeing eyebrows in a dream, indicates the good reputation of the dreamer. Seeing eyebrows indicates that you will occupy a new position and occupy a new position in the future. Seeing eyebrows can indicate parents and can indicate a business partner, children, or spouses. The interpretation of seeing the shape of an eyebrow in a dream varies depending on its appearance in the dream. Thick eyebrows that are full of hair in this dream are beneficial to the dreamer, because they indicate a lot of goodness, blessing, and abundance of food. As for who sees in the dream? The eyebrows gathered together or they are connected to each other, This dream shows affection and captivating love and can indicate love and affection between people. As for one who sees in a dream the eyebrows separated, this dream can indicate the distance and difference between family members. As for the one who sees in a dream two equal eyebrows and their natural doubts, this dream deserves praise for The dreamer indicates good deeds and changing the situation for the better. Interpretation of seeing the color of the eyebrow in a dream: The eyebrow is a way to protect the eye from water, sweat, and rainwater, and it also gives the face a distinctive and beautiful appearance, and the color of the eyebrow in a dream changes its interpretation. If the eyebrow is very black in the dream, This indicates a good situation for the better in reality. As for someone who sees a white eyebrow in a dream, this indicates longevity, and God knows best. The dream may indicate a change in the situation for the worse. There are those who interpreted seeing a white eyebrow in a dream as an indication of entering into a period of worries and problems. Interpretation of seeing eyebrows for men: A man who dreams of eyebrows in a dream, this dream shows his religion and his status in the world. Eyebrows in a dream indicate spouses or parents. If he sees in a dream that the eyebrows are close, this indicates affection and love for his wife. However, if he sees in a dream the eyebrows separated or far apart, then this dream indicates distance with his wife. There are interpretations of seeing an eyebrow in a dream as the jewel of life. If you see a man’s eyebrow in a dream, this may indicate illness and fatigue. Interpretation of seeing an eyebrow in a woman’s dreamThe unmarried woman For a woman who sees an eyebrow in a dream, this dream refers to her parents or relatives. As for a woman who sees an eyebrow in a dream while she is married, this dream refers to her husband and children. In general, seeing an eyebrow in a dream indicates ease of the situation and the acquisition of goodness. As for someone who dreams of falling eyebrows, This dream does not bode well, as it may indicate illness, severe sadness, or the loss of a family member. As for seeing the eyebrows symmetrical and beautiful, this indicates goodness and blessings in life. Therefore, we have provided you with all possible interpretations of seeing an eyebrow in a dream. Anyone who has a vision And he wants to explain it. We welcome your comments at the end of the article and we will give you an answer as quickly as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about collecting grape leaves for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing grape leaves in a dream for one girl: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she collected grapes and cut all of their leaves. This dream indicates that she will be happy and comfortable and will get a lot of money in the coming days. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is picking grapes. This dream indicates This girl will soon be engaged to a young man whose moral qualities are beautiful and respectable. They will live happily and contentedly, and joy will prevail between them in their married life. Whereas if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is picking grapes from the tree, then they are red or green. This dream indicates that she excels. In her studies and also in her work, she excels in her public life. This dream also indicates that this girl will get a new job that she has been waiting for and will be promoted in it. If an unmarried girl sees herself picking grapes, her color will be black. This indicates that this girl will go through bad circumstances. And problems, fears, and heartaches. But if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is eating grapes and the color of those grapes is red, then she cuts the leaves. This dream indicates that this girl is good and beloved and that her qualities are good. She will marry someone who will make her happy and respect and appreciate her. See also: Dreaming of eating Grapes: Interpretation of watching grape picking in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is cutting grape leaves. This dream indicates that she will obtain a lot of money and money. She will obtain a high position for promotion. But if a married woman sees in her dream that she is cutting grape leaves and cooking them for her family. This dream indicates that this girl performs her duties at home perfectly. She takes care of her home, her children, her friendly relationship with her husband, and the joy, happiness, and respect between them. Also, if a married woman dreams that she is cutting grape leaves, then they are red. This dream indicates that this woman She will hear the news of the pregnancy soon. And God will feed her with a boy whose moral qualities will be beautiful and good. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is gathering grape leaves, and there are many grapes, then this woman is also pregnant. This dream indicates that this woman will achieve everything she wants. She will get rid of Everything that confuses her life and causes her suffering. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is collecting grape leaves, then this is also impure or damaged. This dream indicates that this woman is going through a difficult time in her life with sadness. This dream also indicates the possibility of her separating from her husband through divorce. Or separation from her family. Interpretation of seeing grape leaves in a dream about a man and its meaning. If one sees in his dream that there are grapes, and that person collects grape leaves from the tree. This dream indicates that this man will hear good news. It will work soon and it will last for a long time. But if Someone saw in his dream that he was collecting grape leaves, cooking them and eating them. This dream indicates that this man lives a life full of happiness and joy and soon he will hear the news of his joy. Whereas if someone sees in his dream that there are grape leaves in his house, then these leaves are also many. This dream indicates that this person will receive a lot

title: Interpretation of human smell in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The interpretation of a person’s smell in a dream is considered one of the dreams that many people seek, because the interpretation of this vision has a meaning that is related to the morals and reputation of the person from whom the smell appears in the dream, meaning that whenever the smell is aromatic, the vision has good meanings, just as an unpleasant smell has an interpretation. Unpleasant, so let us remind you in this article of the interpretation of smelling someone’s perfume in a dream.Interpretation of a person’s scent in a dreamThe interpretation of seeing someone smelling a bad odor emanating from him in a dream indicates that this indicates the words of the fortuneteller and bad qualities and cauterization in the dream.If The dreamer smells a good smell from someone in a dream, then this is a sign of the person’s love and affection towards the dreamer. If the employer sees that he smells a bad smell in a dream, this indicates the expectation of major problems and disagreements, especially with the people who work for him. Smelling a bad smell from a person Familiar in a dream, and this indicates the corruption and exposure of that person. While smelling a foul odor in a dream is evidence that you have fallen into conspiracies and conspiracies. Interpretation of human odor in a dream by Ibn Sirini. Interpretation of a foul odor in a dream indicates bad reputation and scandals, and it could be a sign of religion and slander. Whoever sees that he smells a bad odor in a dream, he will hear unpleasant news. Seeing someone smelling a bad odor in a dream symbolizes the bad qualities of the dreamer and indicates the sins and sins that the person has committed, and if he continues with them, he will discover what he is doing. In front of people. Smell a man’s scent and it is good and pleasant in a dream, a sign of goodness and purity. The online dream interpretation website is a website specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. All you have to do is type the online dream interpretation site in Google and get the correct interpretations.Interpretation of the smell of someone’s perfume in a dream for a single womanIf the person who smelled the scent of her single girl is unknown, then there is someone who is bewitching and seducing her and wants to seduce her and she must be careful.Whoever smells the scent of a known man in A dream in which he smells good and delicious is evidence of the girl’s fascination with this person and her intense admiration for him. If the dreamer is engaged or in a love relationship with someone and his smell in the dream was unpleasant and not good, then this is evidence that this person is deceiving her and showing her the opposite of what he is hiding, which is. You will regret it if you stay together. Interpretation of dreams of someone smelling my perfume for a single woman. An unmarried girl who dreams that someone smells her perfume and admires it indicates that a good and handsome man has proposed to her and she must accept it. Seeing an unmarried woman smelling perfume in a dream indicates a life Full of happiness and a bright future awaits her. Interpretation of the smell of someone in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of the smell of an unknown person in a dream for a married woman. If the smell is foul and disgusting, it is not popular with people because of its bad reputation. If a married woman sees in a dream someone whose smell she knows Good, it means that this person speaks well of her and that
